content.value: [Chef Infra Webinar] Join our webinar Chef Workstation: One Click a Way from Everything on July 29 to learn about Chef Workstation, the replacement for Chef DK. Join @dan_webb, Senior Developer Advocate to learn what’s new with Chef Workstation: prgress.co/3hOvY1d
